segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even trying to help him balance, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking up at him, it’s like she trusts him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But he’s not exactly being safe up there, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water’s getting closer to them, and they’re both going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they both are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also want to shake them and tell them to stop before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of sweet and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
